snippet.title: Buzzard Bait (Apple II - Sirius Software)
snippet.description:
Buzzard Bait (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/buzzard-bait_) was an action game published by Sirius Software in 1983 for the Apple ][. I was hoping for some cut scenes after passing certain level, but the game just seemed to keep repeating itself. Hope you enjoy the short play!

PS: To get infinite lives, change $6E42 to $A9. The # of lives is stored at address $40.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com (roughana)
Disk image - 4AM
